title: Fortnite is now available on Nintendo Switch: All you need to know
dc:creator: FE Online
content: Fortnite for Nintendo Switch brings the Fortnite Battle Royale mode onboard, however, the Save the World mode will not be available to the Nintendo Switch users
contentSnippet: Fortnite for Nintendo Switch brings the Fortnite Battle Royale mode onboard, however, the Save the World mode will not be available to the Nintendo Switch users
